name: Truck Driving Offroad Sim
description:
Welcome to Cargo Offroad Truck Driver Simulator And Enjoy Hill Climb Driving on Outback Hills!

Do you have the experience of driving long heavy duty truck in hill environment? If no, then unleash yourself with the best so ever Truck driving simulator with realistic background and features. Believe me cruising a heavy truck on offroad tracks is one hell of a job. Heavy duty trucks can not beer sharp turns and truck crash eloquently. This amazing offroad driving game is basically for cargo transport game lovers. Test your heavy duty driving skills and become an expert new cargo truck driver in this hill climb drive mania. New Cargo truck driving is not an easy job especially when it is loaded with wood logs and heavy material. Show your driving skills by transporting cargo in this offroad cargo truck driving simulator. Hilly Paths are very difficult to drive on but you can handle long oil trucks using your perfect driving skills. Drive safely on dangerous tracks like dirt tracks and twisty tracks, maintain speed of the large vehicle at sharp turns and steep curves. Don’t over speed otherwise you may lose your truck. This hill side riding game is quite different from other offroad games as it gives you realistic experience of solo hill climb driving and hill parking safely in limited time. Your main job is to drive the semi truck via curvy paths and steep curves to the desired destination without facing a deadly truck crash.

Features:

- Best offroad truck driving simulator with virtual gameplay
- Variety of offroad tracks, like dirt tracks, twisty tracks etc
- Realistic physics with exciting levels
- Multiple driver camera views
- Face different weathers
- Smooth controls and easy handling
- 10 trucking levels
- Exotic 3D environment
- Only realistic trucking game in the market
